programme.title: Wild Things with Dominic Monaghan
programme.desc: Follow actor Dominic Monaghan on the hunt for the most dangerous, spectacular and elusive wild creatures on the planet in this original travel series.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: We explore the extraordinary lives of nature's wildest, most incredible, and sometimes weirdest animals and discover how they have learned to adapt, survive and evolve in every corner of the Earth.

programme.title: Inside Taronga Zoo
programme.desc: We are given an intimate look at just what it takes to run one of the world's most famous zoos; 240 passionate keepers and vets take care for the more than 5000 animals at the park.

programme.title: Wild Bear Rescue
programme.desc: Bristling with drama, comedy, and irresistible cuteness, 'Wild Bear Rescue' tracks the raising of endearing bear cubs from their dramatic rescues to their releases the following year.

programme.title: Work On The Wild Side
programme.desc: We follow vets and volunteers who gave up their day jobs in the UK and moved to South Africa to rescue, rehabilitate, and release some of the world's most endangered animals.

programme.title: Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: Dogs may be known as man's best friend, but this series celebrates the amazing real-life stories about the most unlikely friendships between dogs and other animal species.

programme.title: Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: Dogs may be known as man's best friend, but this series celebrates the amazing real-life stories about the most unlikely friendships between dogs and other animal species.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Skeldale's team have a real passion for animals. With a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit, together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Dog Squad - Puppy School
programme.desc: Follow the journey of puppies as they train to become mobility and guide dogs; we show the contrasting traits, personalities and skills required from each breed in order to become a dog with a job.

programme.title: The Serengeti Rules
programme.desc: Travel back in time - from the Arctic Ocean to Pacific tide pools - with a pioneering group of scientists who make surprising discoveries that transform human understanding of nature and ecology.

programme.title: Wild Sri Lanka: Realm of the Leopard
programme.desc: This film looks at Sri Lanka's wildlife; leopards, jackals and crocodiles are the apex predators, but it also boasts some of the rarest creatures on Earth, including the sloth bear and the grey loris.

programme.title: Looking for Sultan
programme.desc: Sultan, the up-and-coming dominant tiger of a large reserve in India, vanishes suddenly; father and son filmmakers Mike and Gautam try to put the pieces together to solve this mystery.

programme.title: Hunt For The Russian Tiger
programme.desc: British ecologist Chris Morgan meets up with Korean cameraman Sooyong Park in Russia's far eastern forests to find and film the Siberian tiger, something only Sooyong had achieved before.

programme.title: Vanishing Kings - Lions of the Namib
programme.desc: For the first time ever we can observe the secret lives of true desert lions; they roam rugged mountains, sand dunes, endless gravel plains and sometimes even the beaches of Namibia's Skeleton Coast.

programme.title: Vanishing Kings - Lions of the Namib II
programme.desc: In the Namib Desert, a young lion roams across the barren plains; he has ended up in a place far away from home and is desperate to find his brothers. He has just started the journey of a lifetime...

programme.title: Natural World - Jaguars - Brazil's Super Cats
programme.desc: Jaguars are South America's supreme predator, but they are also one of the most elusive animals on the planet; we follow individual wild jaguars to gain amazing new insights into their lives.

programme.title: The Elephant Hospital
programme.desc: Take a trip to the world's largest hospital devoted solely to treating elephants: the Elephant Hospital in Lampang in Thailand, which cares for over 100 sick, injured, or neglected elephants each year.

programme.title: The Elephant Hospital
programme.desc: Take a trip to the world's largest hospital devoted solely to treating elephants: the Elephant Hospital in Lampang in Thailand, which cares for over 100 sick, injured, or neglected elephants each year.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue
programme.desc: Set on Canada's beautiful Pacific Coast, this is an action-driven series about a group of veterinarians and technicians devoted to saving the lives of wild marine mammals and setting them free.

programme.title: Wild Canadian Weather
programme.desc: This series weaves together stories of how different species across Canada harness the incredible power of the weather to migrate, hunt, escape danger and reproduce.

programme.title: Wild Canada II
programme.desc: This series features never-before-seen wildlife stories and stunning landscapes, painting an awe-inspiring picture of a land full of amazing wildlife shaped by man over thousands of years.
